greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of centered orthotopic numbers
comment: T(n, k) = [x^k] series[ H(n - k, x) ]
Here H(n,x) = E(n,x)*(1+x)/(1-x)^(n+1) where E(n,x) are the Eulerian polynomials, E(0,x) = 1 and E(n,x) = sum_{k=0^{n-1}} W_{n,k} x^k for n > 0. W_{n,k} as in DLMF Table 26.14.1.
link: Peter Luschny, Figurate number - a very short introduction
mathematica: Table[T[n, k], {n, 0, 8}, {k, 0, n}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 17 2019, from Maple *)
xref: Cf. Row sums in A179928, triangle of orthotopic numbers is A009998.
results.author: _Peter Luschny_, Aug 02 2010
